text: allaah ek misaal pesh karata hai ki ek vyakti hai, jisake maalik hone mein kaee kyakti saakshee hai, aapas mein kheenchaataanee karanevaale, aur ek kyakti vah hai jo poora ka poora ek hee vyakti ka hai. kya donon ka haal ek jaisa hoga? saaree prashansa allaah hee ke lie hai, kintu unamen se adhikaansh log nahin jaanate
